# Hey, I'm happy you're here

Thanks for stopping by!

I'm a data scientist and research assistant at the [Spanish Institute of Oceanography (IEO-CSIC)](https://www.ieo.csic.es/). My research interests include applications of data science in oceanography and environmental science.

I work on projects that utilize various data sources to explore and solve environmental problems. Learn more about my research interests in [publications](/about/publications.qmd).

Get in touch by [sending me a note](/contact.qmd)! {{< fa feather-pointed >}}
:::

## About me

::: grid
::: {#about-me-1 .g-col-6}
Environmental scientist with a passion for data science and its applications to oceanography and environmental research.

I enjoy using [R](https://www.r-project.org/about.html) and other data science tools to optimize workflows and uncover insights from complex data. Keep up with my work in my [publications](/about/publications.qmd).
:::

::: {#about-me-2 .g-col-6}
Prior to joining the IEO-CSIC, I developed methods to analyze environmental data and study ecological trends. My work aims to support sustainable practices and policies through data-driven research.
:::
